title: mugguNa mAyaiyil
sahitya:
mugguNa mAyaiyil sikki alaiyAdu mukti taruvAi appanE jIvan mukti taruvAi paranE


anupallavi

  pakkuvamAi ulagaip-pArAdu pArttirukkum parama upa shAnta varamE shubha karamE


caraNam    enadu yAn engira irumAppu pollAdE endap-poruLum ingE vandadu nillAdE
manadu nilaittunandu mArAda dhyAnattil mangaLa bhavapriyA shivapriyaiyAgavE 
munnilum munnavan. (tEvAra paN-kolli).  
munnilum munnavan pinnilum pinnavan ennavan unnavan engumE onravan
un manaikkappuram uLLa ponnambalam tan manai koNDavan tattuvAtItanE
pannilai ulaginaip-pArpparap-pArppavan unnal onruTravan unnutarkk-Anavan
tannilai ninraruT-shaktiyAm AnaiyAl munnilai ulagilE muttozhil puribavan
paNgaLArp-pADuvOm paNigaLArp-pOTruvOm eNNuvOm Ishanai eNNarak-kUDuvOm
puNkaLAr piraviyaip-pOkkiDum kaDavuLaik-kaNgaLAQrk-kANuvOm kAdalArk-kUDuvOm
